name: Sneaky Rat
description:
Sneaky Rat is a game where the player has to take the rat to the cheese, but it cannot be seen by the cat, so avoid walking in the light.

Manipulate mirrors...


...gates...


...boxes...


...and more mirros.



  • 50 hand-crafted levels;
  • Original soundtrack, composed especially for you to feel immersed in the game;
  • Made for everyone who loves puzzle;
  • In each level a new feature;
